thread.section_title: Premier Inn London Hackney Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Very good!
thread.title_full: Very good! - Review of Premier Inn London Hackney Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Francesca T
title: Very good!
text:
The hotel is very clean, silent and usefull for its position.
With only one bus line (38) you can reach the main center of London like Waterloo station or Piccadilly Circus.
In front of the hotel there is the orange overground line (junction station).
In this quartes live many etnies like afro-american people.
The Continental breakfast is fresh and rich.
The double room has one double bed and a sofa bed with bathtube in the bathroom but no bidet.
I suggest this 3* hotel.
